messages.subject: OT:  Lisa's Memorial...
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Folks, I woke up this morning, of course, thinking about Lisa, and I just had an idea as I was reading all the beautiful emails I ve received while I was
messages.messageBody:
Dear Folks,

I woke up this morning, of course, thinking about Lisa, and I just
had an idea as I was reading all the beautiful emails I've received
while I was sleeping.

I would like to invite folks, especially folks who won't be able to
attend tomorrow's memorial, to send me their joyous recollections,
impressions, or messages they would like to share about Lisa. If her
Light has reached you in some way, whether physically, in her
writing, in your experience of Roxy and Fire, or just in your having
heard about this glorious, vibrant woman whose rich, full life and
beautiful, amazing family defined her way more than the story of how
the light went out did, and you would like to share it, please send
it to me at:

marji @ gaiawolf . org (without the spaces)

I only just had this idea, so I have not run it by Larry, Roxy and
Ruby, but if they are anemable, I or someone (as per Lisa's family's
wishes) will read them tomorrow at the service. If they would prefer
not, then I will print up the collection (in a beautiful way) and I
will give this to them. In fact, I'll do that anyway.


In gratitude for and in celebration of Lisa's Light and Life,
Marji


P.S. If you would like to be anonymous, please make sure to say so.
P.P.S. If you have already sent me something but would *not* like me
to share that, please let me know.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
